title: Vietifiency Dan Course
description: A short course guide you to the Vietnamese Language
start_label: Where do you want to start ?
easysel:
This section will have 30 questions,
 you will need to achieve 96% or more in order to pass this section.
Bạn sẵn sàng chưa ?
medsel:
This section will have 40 questions,
 you will need to achieve 90% or more in order to pass this section.
Sẵn sàng rồi chứ ?
hdsel:
This section will have 40 questions,
 you will need to achieve 90% or more in order to pass this section.
Chúc may mắn!
dumbsel:
This section go through the very basic concept of Vietnamese,
 such as sentence, tone and pronunciation.
Bạn sẵn sàng chưa ?
easydiff:
Suitable for
newcommer
Learn the basic
sentence structure
and words.
meddiff:
Suitable for
continuer from the basic.
More advanced
sentence structure
and vocabulary.
harddiff:
Suitable for 
advanced learners.
Things will be
more challenging
from here.
ques: Choose the best response for 'Chào buổi sáng, hôm nay bạn thế nào ?

Choose the correct answer to complete the sentence
'________, tôi là Minh,rất vui được làm quen!
Which sentence is the correct translation for 'Xin lỗi, tôi là người Việt'
'Hôm nay trời nắng quá' - What does this statement mean ?
Choose the correct letter to complete the word: 'H_m nay'(Today)
Choose the correct letter to complete the word: 'Vui v_'(Happy)

Choose the correct letter/s to complete the word:
'__ế'(Chair)

Choose the correct response for:
'Bạn tên là gì ?'

Listen and answer the question.
What does this person say ?
Listen and choose the correct response.

Choose the correct letter/s to complete the word:
'__ĩ'(Think)

Choose the correct letter/s to complete the word:
'__ủ'(Sleep)

Choose the correct word to complete the sentence:
'Hôm nay, trời__to'(Today, the rain is heavy)
'Xin lỗi vì đã làm phiền!' - Translate into English.
Translate the sentence 'Tôi đến từ Úc' into English.
What is the Vietnamese word for 'yes'?
options: Tạm biệt nha, tôi đi trước
Rất hân hạnh được làm quen.
